testcase.classname: This describe the Clearance functionality for HeatClinic Application
testcase.name: 1.User can click and view price on "Green Ghost" product and navigate back to clearance page
testcase.system-out: Given user not a validated..................................................passed When user browse to the "http://heatclinic.shiftedtech.com/"................passed Then homepage window should display on maximize size........................passed When user able to click on Clearance button.................................passed Then Clearance page should display..........................................passed Then in single page user able to see five products..........................passed Then user can able to see Green Ghost product name..........................passed Then user can able to see price tag for Green Ghost product.................passed When user click on Green Ghost product......................................passed Then Green Ghost product page should display................................passed Then user can navigate back to previous page................................passed
